main_definition: Individuals who are highly skilled, trained, or experienced in a specific field or occupation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Experts with specialized knowledge and skills in their respective fields.
meanings_and_examples.example: The engineers were professionals when it came to designing complex structures.

meanings_and_examples.definition: People who have undergone formal training or education to perform a job efficiently.
meanings_and_examples.example: A group of certified accountants who can handle financial records and audits with precision.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Those who adhere strictly to ethical guidelines, standards, and best practices within their profession.
meanings_and_examples.example: The surgeons were professional in maintaining the highest level of hygiene and patient care during operations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Persons recognized for consistently delivering high-quality work and meeting or exceeding expectations.
meanings_and_examples.example: A renowned architect who has designed several award-winning buildings, is considered a professional in the field of architecture.
